Change Log
==========

0.0.4 (08/12/2020)
-------------------
- Added list_tables method.
- Added n_rows to get_table, which will get first n rows.
- Added a bunch of docstrings.


0.0.3 (08/12/2020)
-------------------
- Added Manifest so building from source doesnt fail.


0.0.2 (08/12/2020)
-------------------
- Added keywords, still giving this some form.


0.0.1 (04/12/2020)
-------------------
- First Release
